Cornucopia

miscellaneous (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 328
temporary nature gems [tmpnaturegems]: 2N
supply bonus [supplybonus]: +50

Requires 15N to forge (N3)

Blowing the Horn of Plenty will not only produce all manner of fruits and legumes but also a limited quantity of short lived Nature gems. These gems can be used by Nature mages to fuel their combat spells, but they are too short lived to be of any use in rituals.
